model_details.description: This is a multiple choice model patterned after the BERT architecture. It calculates a score for each sequence on top of the CLS token, and then chooses the alternative with the highest score.
model_details.short_description: RoBERTa-based multiple choice model for CommonSenseQA.

paper.title: RoBERTa: A Robustly Optimized BERT Pretraining Approach (Liu et al)

metrics.model_performance_measures: The chosen metric is accuracy, since it is a multiple choice model.

dataset.name: CommonSenseQA (validation set)
dataset.notes: Please download the data from the url provided.

dataset.name: CommonSenseQA (train set)
dataset.notes: Please download the data from the url provided.
